org.modelio.api.module

Class DefaultModuleSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.api.module.DefaultModuleSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModuleSession

    public class DefaultModuleSession
extends Object
implements IModuleSession
    Default implementation of the IModuleSession interface.

    This default implementation may be inherited by the module developers in order to simplify the code writing of the mdac session.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Module of the session.

      • install

        public static boolean install(String modelioPath,
              String installPath)
                       throws ModuleException
        Accepts the installation by default.
        Parameters:
        modelioPath - the path of modelio application
        installPath - the path where the module archive contents have been expanded.
        Returns:
        true if the module accepts to be installed false otherwise.
        Throws:
        ModuleException - when the installation failed.

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade(Version oldVersion,
           Map<String,String> oldParameters)
             throws ModuleException
        The old parameter list is copied and pasted on the new module installation.

        All the parameter keys that exist in the new version are automatically updated from the old parameters.

        Specified by:
        upgrade in interface IModuleSession
        Parameters:
        oldVersion - The previous version of the MDAC
        oldParameters - The previous list of parameters (key, value)
        Throws:
        ModuleException - when an error occurs preventing the module from being upgraded.
